00023    /*
00024    * Constructor.
00025    */
00026    DumpConfig::DumpConfig(System& system) 
00027     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00028       nSample_(0),
00029       isInitialized_(false)
00030    {}
00031 
00032    /*
00033    * Read interval and outputFileName. 
00034    */
00035    void DumpConfig::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00036    {
00037       readInterval(in);
00038       readOutputFileName(in);
00039       isInitialized_ = true;
00040    }
00041 
00042    /*
00043    * Read interval and outputFileName. 
00044    */
00045    void DumpConfig::setup() 
00046    {  nSample_ = 0; }
00047 
00048    /*
00049    * Dump configuration to file
00050    */
00051    void DumpConfig::sample(long iStep) 
00052    {
00053       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00054 
00055          // Construct new fileName: outputFileName + toString(nSample)
00056          std::string filename;
00057          filename  = outputFileName();
00058          filename += toString(nSample_);
00059 
00060          // Open output file, write data, and close file
00061          fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile_);
00062          system().writeConfig(outputFile_);
00063          outputFile_.close();
00064          ++nSample_;
00065 
00066       }
00067    }
00068   
00069    /*
00070    * Save state to binary file archive.
00071    */
00072    void DumpConfig::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00073    { ar & *this; }
00074 
00075    /*
00076    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00077    */
00078    void DumpConfig::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00079    { ar & *this; }
00080 
00081 }
